title: S12 Ep64: The History and Haunting of Lizzie Borden
itunes:title: The History and Haunting of Lizzie Borden
description:
In time for the 125th Anniversary of one of the first crimes to really capture the imagination of America we reexamine this case with Rebecca Pittman who has poured through the archives and uncovered SHOCKING new evidence that finally puts to rest the question, "Did Lizzie do it?"

Rebecca Pittman: http://www.rebeccafpittmanbooks.com/
